[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1527751537655{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 90px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1527750592187{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Project Management” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:40px|text_align:center|line_height:50px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689856677796{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”font-weight-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”Success in the dynamic Oil and Energy industry demands seamless Project Management solutions. Victory Oil and Energy stands apart, offering a superior level of expertise and a full suite of first-class Project management solutions. Our seasoned professionals will ensure that every aspect of your project from Implementation to Execution is expertly handled.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1691269688277{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1527755762708{margin-top: 10px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1527755771300{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

[vc_custom_heading text=”Operations and Maintenance” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:20px|text_align:center|line_height:30px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”letter-spacing-0″ css=”.vc_custom_1689856839405{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 23px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Maintaining and optimizing the performance of the oil and energy facilities, including regular inspections and repairs, and implementing best practices to minimize downtime and ensure efficient and safe operations.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689856857406{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1527755777716{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]
[vc_custom_heading text=”Project Implementation and Execution” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:20px|text_align:center|line_height:30px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”letter-spacing-0″ css=”.vc_custom_1689856780259{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”This covers all aspects of actually executing the project, from securing necessary permits and licenses to coordinating with contractors and suppliers to overseeing construction and operations.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689856821069{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1527755785532{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]
[vc_custom_heading text=”Exploration and Development Planning” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:20px|text_align:center|line_height:30px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”letter-spacing-0″ css=”.vc_custom_1689856739852{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Identifying potential sites for oil and energy exploration, conducting surveys and assessments, and creating development plans for the most promising areas.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689856756321{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
